attributes.action: Stricter laws on air rifles and guns
attributes.additional_details: Because the is a alarming rise in animals being shot by them , and the misuse of guns in general. Also would be easier for police to regulate.
attributes.background: Make it law to have a license to own one and under 18's need a licensed owner to supervise them. Also all guns to be kept at a gun club and to be used in designated areas.
